data.title: Shadai Stallion Station
data.meta_description: EPIPHANEIA産駒のご紹介。血統表・競走成績・種牡馬成績はこちら。社台スタリオンステーションは世界に通用する馬づくりを目標に種牡馬事業全般を行なっています。
data.text:
STUD RECORD

Epiphaneia entered stud in Japan in 2016.

Note: Epiphaneia stood on Southern Hemisphere time in Japan in 2015.

In 2023, Epiphaneia's two-year-old crop performed very well, producing 29 winners in JRA races, including Stellenbosch, who finished second in the Grade 1 Hanshin Juvenile Fillies. Also in 2023, Justin Cafe (5yo) captured the Grade 3 Epsom Cup, Selberg (4yo) took the Grade 3 Chukyo Kinen, and Moryana (3yo) won the Grade 2 Shion Stakes.

He was ranked second on the Japanese Leading Two-Year-Old Sire list in 2023.

He was ranked ninth on the JRA Leading Sire list in 2023.
